e: ￹`Ano~ `romakat~ `kiso~ `i~, `aka~ `ka~`po'lin~.￺Don't fall when you walk.￻你走路時可不要跌倒
￹`Ma~`polin~ `to~ `ko~ `kitakit~ `ita~.￺Our country has fallen.￻我們的國家被打倒了，我們的國家亡了
￹`'Odoten~ `nira~ `koya~ `tamdaw~ `a~ `mi~`polin~.￺He attacked the man and knocked him down.￻他攻擊並打倒那個人
d.f: ￹￺to fall * with literal and figurative meanings￻跌倒，摔倒，陷落，含字面比喻的意思
